comment:
* Class containing the identifiers used to update device management-related system strings
         * in the android core package.
         *
         * @hide

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_DELETED_TITLE
variables.comment: * Notification title when the system deletes the work profile.

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_DELETED_FAILED_PASSWORD_ATTEMPTS_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Content text for the "Work profile deleted" notification to indicates that a work
             * profile has been deleted because the maximum failed password attempts as been
             * reached.

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_DELETED_GENERIC_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Content text for the "Work profile deleted" notification to indicate that a work
             * profile has been deleted.

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_DELETED_ORG_OWNED_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Content text for the "Work profile deleted" notification to indicates that a work
             * profile has been deleted because the admin of an organization-owned device has
             * relinquishes it.

variables.name: PERSONAL_APP_SUSPENSION_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Notification title for when personal apps are either blocked or will be blocked
             * soon due to a work policy from their admin.

variables.name: PERSONAL_APP_SUSPENSION_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Content text for the personal app suspension notification to indicate that personal
             * apps are blocked due to a work policy from the admin.

variables.name: PERSONAL_APP_SUSPENSION_SOON_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Content text for the personal app suspension notification to indicate that personal * apps will be blocked at a particular time due to a work policy from their admin. * It also explains for how many days the profile is allowed to be off. *
    Takes in the following as params: *
  • The date that the personal apps will get suspended at
    • *
  • The time that the personal apps will get suspended at
    • *
  • The max allowed days for the work profile stay switched off
    • *

variables.name: PERSONAL_APP_SUSPENSION_TURN_ON_PROFILE
variables.comment:
* Title for the button that turns work profile in the personal app suspension
             * notification.

variables.name: PRINTING_DISABLED_NAMED_ADMIN
variables.comment:
* A toast message displayed when printing is attempted but disabled by policy, accepts
             * admin name as a param.

variables.name: LOCATION_CHANGED_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Notification title to indicate that the device owner has changed the location
             * settings.

variables.name: LOCATION_CHANGED_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Content text for the location changed notification to indicate that the device owner
             * has changed the location settings.

variables.name: NETWORK_LOGGING_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Notification title to indicate that the device is managed and network logging was
             * activated by a device owner.

variables.name: NETWORK_LOGGING_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Content text for the network logging notification to indicate that the device is
             * managed and network logging was activated by a device owner.

variables.name: NOTIFICATION_WORK_PROFILE_CONTENT_DESCRIPTION
variables.comment: * Content description of the work profile icon in the notifications.

variables.name: NOTIFICATION_CHANNEL_DEVICE_ADMIN
variables.comment:
* Notification channel name for high-priority alerts from the user's IT admin for key
             * updates about the device.

variables.name: SWITCH_TO_WORK_LABEL
variables.comment:
* Label returned from
             * {@link android.content.pm.CrossProfileApps#getProfileSwitchingLabel(UserHandle)}
             * that calling app can show to user for the semantic of switching to work profile, and
             * accepts the app name as a param.

variables.name: SWITCH_TO_PERSONAL_LABEL
variables.comment:
* Label returned from
             * {@link android.content.pm.CrossProfileApps#getProfileSwitchingLabel(UserHandle)}
             * that calling app can show to user for the semantic of switching to personal profile,
             * and accepts the app name as a param.

variables.name: FORWARD_INTENT_TO_WORK
variables.comment: * Message to show when an intent automatically switches users into the work profile.

variables.name: FORWARD_INTENT_TO_PERSONAL
variables.comment:
* Message to show when an intent automatically switches users into the personal
             * profile.

variables.name: RESOLVER_WORK_PROFILE_NOT_SUPPORTED
variables.comment:
* Text for the toast that is shown when the user clicks on a launcher that doesn't
             * support the work profile, takes in the launcher name as a param.

variables.name: RESOLVER_PERSONAL_TAB
variables.comment: * Label for the personal tab in the {@link com.android.internal.app.ResolverActivity).

variables.name: RESOLVER_WORK_TAB
variables.comment: * Label for the work tab in the {@link com.android.internal.app.ResolverActivity).

variables.name: RESOLVER_PERSONAL_TAB_ACCESSIBILITY
variables.comment:
* Accessibility Label for the personal tab in the
             * {@link com.android.internal.app.ResolverActivity).

variables.name: RESOLVER_WORK_TAB_ACCESSIBILITY
variables.comment:
* Accessibility Label for the work tab in the
             * {@link com.android.internal.app.ResolverActivity).

variables.name: RESOLVER_CROSS_PROFILE_BLOCKED_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Title for resolver screen to let the user know that their IT admin doesn't allow
             * them to share this content across profiles.

variables.name: RESOLVER_CANT_SHARE_WITH_PERSONAL
variables.comment:
* Description for resolver screen to let the user know that their IT admin doesn't
             * allow them to share this content with apps in their personal profile.

variables.name: RESOLVER_CANT_SHARE_WITH_WORK
variables.comment:
* Description for resolver screen to let the user know that their IT admin doesn't
             * allow them to share this content with apps in their work profile.

variables.name: RESOLVER_CANT_ACCESS_PERSONAL
variables.comment:
* Description for resolver screen to let the user know that their IT admin doesn't
             * allow them to open this specific content with an app in their personal profile.

variables.name: RESOLVER_CANT_ACCESS_WORK
variables.comment:
* Description for resolver screen to let the user know that their IT admin doesn't
             * allow them to open this specific content with an app in their work profile.

variables.name: RESOLVER_WORK_PAUSED_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Title for resolver screen to let the user know that they need to turn on work apps
             * in order to share or open content

variables.name: RESOLVER_NO_WORK_APPS
variables.comment:
* Text on resolver screen to let the user know that their current work apps don't
             * support the specific content.

variables.name: RESOLVER_NO_PERSONAL_APPS
variables.comment:
* Text on resolver screen to let the user know that their current personal apps don't
             * support the specific content.

variables.name: CANT_ADD_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE
variables.comment: * Message informing user that the adding the account is disallowed by an administrator.

variables.name: PACKAGE_INSTALLED_BY_DO
variables.comment: * Notification shown when device owner silently installs a package.

variables.name: PACKAGE_UPDATED_BY_DO
variables.comment: * Notification shown when device owner silently updates a package.

variables.name: PACKAGE_DELETED_BY_DO
variables.comment: * Notification shown when device owner silently deleted a package.

variables.name: UNLAUNCHABLE_APP_WORK_PAUSED_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Title for dialog shown when user tries to open a work app when the work profile is
             * turned off, confirming that the user wants to turn on access to their
             * work apps.

variables.name: PROFILE_ENCRYPTED_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Notification title shown when work profile is credential encrypted and requires
             * the user to unlock before it's usable.

variables.name: PROFILE_ENCRYPTED_DETAIL
variables.comment:
* Notification detail shown when work profile is credential encrypted and requires
             * the user to unlock before it's usable.

variables.name: PROFILE_ENCRYPTED_MESSAGE
variables.comment:
* Notification message shown when work profile is credential encrypted and requires
             * the user to unlock before it's usable.

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_BADGED_LABEL
variables.comment:
* Used to badge a string with "Work" for work profile content, e.g. "Work Email". * Accepts the string to badge as an argument. *

See {@link android.content.pm.PackageManager#getUserBadgedLabel}

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_TELEPHONY_PAUSED_TITLE
variables.comment:
* Notification title. This notification lets the user know that they will be unable to
             * receive phone calls or texts until the work profile is turned on.

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_TELEPHONY_PAUSED_BODY
variables.comment:
* Notification text. This notification lets the user know that they will be unable to
             * receive phone calls or texts until the work profile is turned on.

variables.name: WORK_PROFILE_TELEPHONY_PAUSED_TURN_ON_BUTTON
variables.comment: * Label for notification button. This button lets the user turn the work profile on.

variables.name: MINIRESOLVER_WORK_TELEPHONY_CALL_BLOCKED_INFORMATION
variables.comment:
* Information section shown on a dialog when the user is unable to place a call in
             * the personal profile due to admin restrictions, and must choose whether to place
             * the call from the work profile or cancel.

variables.name: MINIRESOLVER_WORK_TELEPHONY_TEXT_BLOCKED_INFORMATION
variables.comment:
* Information section shown on a dialog when the user is unable to send a text in
             * the personal profile due to admin restrictions, and must choose whether to place
             * the call from the work profile or cancel.

variables.name: MINIRESOLVER_CALL_FROM_WORK
variables.comment:
* Button for a dialog shown when the user is unable to place a call in the personal
             * profile due to admin restrictions, and must choose whether to place the call from
             * the work profile or cancel.

variables.name: MINIRESOLVER_SWITCH_TO_WORK
variables.comment:
* Button for a dialog shown when the user has no apps capable of handling an intent
             * in the personal profile, and must choose whether to open the intent in a
             * cross-profile app in the work profile, or cancel.

variables.name: MINIRESOLVER_OPEN_IN_WORK
variables.comment:
* Title for a dialog shown when the user has no apps capable of handling an intent
             * in the personal profile, and must choose whether to open the intent in a
             * cross-profile app in the work profile, or open in the same profile browser. Accepts
             * the app name as a param.

variables.name: MINIRESOLVER_OPEN_IN_PERSONAL
variables.comment:
* Title for a dialog shown when the user has no apps capable of handling an intent
             * in the personal profile, and must choose whether to open the intent in a
             * cross-profile app in the personal profile, or open in the same profile browser.
             * Accepts the app name as a param.

variables.name: MINIRESOLVER_OPEN_WORK
variables.comment:
* Title for a dialog shown when the user has no apps capable of handling an intent
             * in the personal profile, and must choose whether to open the intent in a
             * cross-profile app in the work profile, or cancel. Accepts the app name as a param.
